body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, my name is Jose Rivera and I'm with FastCars R Us. May I ask for your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Emma. Could you please provide me with your phone number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my phone number is eight six seven five five five one two two two.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Emma. And could you also share your email address with me?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, my email is emmaperry@example.com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you for the information, Emma. Is there anything specific I can assist you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I have some questions about the returns process, and I'm feeling a bit nervous about it.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I completely understand, Emma. Let's address your concerns. Please feel free to ask anything you need clarification on.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for taking the time to chat with me, Emma. If you have any more questions in the future, don't hesitate to reach out. Have a great day!
